Class Odometer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      dpmCompetition.Odometer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread

Author:
vivek Calculates the X, Y displacement and the angle the robot is facing from a set origin (heading). Class extends Thread; it will be constantly running in a separate thread
